devdoc.author: davy42
devdoc.details: The InvoiceFactory use the bytecode of the Invoice contract with dynamic token and receiver addresses

computeAddress(uint256,address,address).details: Compute address for depositing funds using salt, token and receivers

params.receiver: The address which will get tokens when withdraw
params.token: The address of the erc20 token which will be deposited

returns._0: wallet the address of the wallet

params.receiver: The address which will get tokens
params.token: The address of the erc20 token which will be withdrawed

devdoc.title: The InvoiceFactory allows withdrawing ERC20 tokens from a temporary Invoice

computeAddress(uint256,address,address).notice: Returns the address of the wallet

withdraw(uint256,address,address).notice: Witdraws erc20 tokens from the deposit wallet and send to the receiver

userdoc.notice: The InvoiceFactory can compute the address for deposit and withdraw funds
